column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////And Common Bonds secret stand out treasure would have to be the wonderful Dave that works there!  ATTENTION MANAGEMENT*** Dave is ah-maz-ing!!!  The kind of worker that goes above and beyond to make your experience enjoyable. Each of my out of towners always remembers two things about CB and that's the food and the Dave experience. He truly is a gem. I hope you recognize and treat him as such.
